EClass.Whiteboard.LayerObject

Class LayerObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • EClass.Whiteboard.LayerObject.LayerObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeLine, Image, Oval, Rectangle, StraightLine, TextBox, Triangle

    public abstract class LayerObject
extends java.lang.Object
    LayerObject is a graphical object to be drawn on a Layer. LayerObjects may be manipulated (move, resize, setColor, and rotate). LayerObjects keep track of their own position on the Layer so they are able to draw themselves.

      • draw

        abstract void draw()
        Draw the LayerObject. This will likely include a paramater that this Layer will draw itself on.

        Draw the LayerObject. This will likely include a paramater that this Layer will draw itself on.

      • resize

        abstract void resize()
        Resize the LayerObject. This is different for each LayerObject; not sure what parameters will be yet.

        Change the rotation of this LayerObject.

        Set the color of this LayerObject.
        Parameters:
